title: Why are there no live BTS concerts in India, and when will they come? - Quora

response.answer_text: Holding a concert in a place depends on various factors such as the success of the albums that were released earlier as in physical sales, streams, itunes charting etc. Though india has always been charting BTS’s song to No 1 in itunes. We somehere lack in physical sales and all. And when it comes to youtube streaming, As an ARMY, it breaks my heart while writing this thing but no video of BTS ever trended in india except the jimmy fallon’s fortnite challenge one :) Though we have dedicated indian fanbases and so many twitter accounts trying to make Bighit notice Indian ARMYs but at the end of the day it all comes down to one point i.e their profit. But hey ! There is a super good news for Indian Armys as BTS’s first movie ‘Burn the stage : the movie’ will be screened in many parts of India. Yayayyayayayayy it’s a huge success and concludes that they are aware of fanbase here :) I am so happy ! As of coming to India i guess this year’s LY World Tour has realeased all asian dates and India is nowhere :’) so some ARMYs will fly to hongkong or bangkok to watch the concerts. But it’s mentioned that more dates will be released so hoping for the best ddaeng
